question:
Consider the following statements about the "Giftmilk" Scheme:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Agriculture
  2. It is being implemented by the National Dairy Development Board
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Ministry of Agriculture has launched the "Giftmilk" scheme. The scheme is being implemented by the National Dairy Development Board. The scheme aims to improve child nutrition thought consumption of milk & milk products by providing milk free of cost. National Dairy Development Board aims to promote, plan and organize programmers for the purpose of development of dairy and other agriculture based and allied industries and biological on an intensive and nation-wide basis and to render assistance in the implementation of such programs.
